R

rankDocuments() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView
Action, and associated background task, to rank the documents of the training set to the current query document.
readDocument(InputStream) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that reads from an InputStream (FileInputStream, NetworkInputStream, ecc..) the title and the text of the document associated with it, using an appropriate scraper, and it returns them inside a vector of strings (position 0: Title, position 1: Text).
readInputDocument() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView
Action, and associated background task, to extract the title and text from the document whose URL has been specified in the JTextField, and which represents the current query.
reduce_table() - Method in class ansascraper.parser
Access to reduce_goto table.
reset() - Method in class documentclassifier.PreferencesDialog
Action to reset all the preferences to their default value.
